Breaking:

IPOB Intelligence, M-Branch, Intercepts False Flag Operation Plotted By Nigerian Army To Kidnap NYSC Members Serving In Southeast,To Serve A Hatchet Agenda Of Blackmailing IPOB 

A disturbing report reaching Family Writers Press International has it that Nigerian Army is plotting to kidnap NYSC members serving in Southeast, in similar fashion to that of Chibok girls case to be used for blackmailing IPOB.

According to the report made available to Family Writers Press International by the General Officer Commanding, GOC,  Eastern Security Network ESN, @MaziChinasaNwaoru, 
the IPOB intelligence unit, The M-Branch intercepted an SOS message sent to youth corpers serving in the region, alerting them of a plan by IPOB to kidnap them in a fashion similar to the Chibok girls abduction.

The report reads,

*"To Corpers actively serving in the East, South East region...*

The IO Nigerian Army said to inform you all corpers  that they intercepted intelligence from IPOB says that they're about to replicate the chibok kidnap incident but this time with Corpers not school students.
So as such be on guard, avoid wearing uniforms and moving in Corper groups.
Don't panic, just be on alert wherever you are."

Reacting to the report, The GOC, Eastern Security Network, Mazi Chinasa Nworu vehemently denied the alleged false flag kidnap SOS message attributed to IPOB sent by the Nigerian Army to NYSC members in Southeast. 

He dismissed it as a propaganda rumour and another plot from the Nigerian military to destabilize Southeast region.

Saying further, Mazi Nwaoru noted that IPOB does not engage in criminality of any sort not alone such crime as kidnapping NYSC members serving in the region. 

He called on the public and NYSC members in Southeast to disregard the lies from the Nigerian Army. Saying, it's a false flag operation plot by the Nigerian Army to blackmail IPOB and ensure Southeast is kept in perpetual turmoil with insecurity.

His tweet reads,

"Note  - The above intelligence the military claim they intercepted from IPOB is completely false and another false flag operation waiting to be carried out in South east region.

The SOS message was  sent to all those serving in Anambra, Imo, Enugu and Abia etc.
The Nigerian military and government are now setting up another false flag operations they want use to destabilize south east, this time against the Nigerian youth corpers. We must all be on high alert".

Family Writers Press International
